description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. RC-AirSim is a radio-controlled model airplane flight simulator.  Learn how to fly a model airplane with RC-AirSim.  R/C model airplane pilots can keep their flying skills current or learn new maneuvers without risking a real model.  RC-AirSim features realistic flight dynamics and aerodynamics, Doppler-correct sound, and 3D graphics. RC-AirSim has aileron, elevator, rudder, and throttle controls.
